reviewText: The entire family enjoyed this,  from the kids to the adults.  My grandson was named Flint after this brave man.

Bought this dvd for my 5 year old Grandson and he loved it and I found it very entertaining and informative...now he wants to be in rodeo....young dreams and imagination ....what more can you ask for....
Flint gives viewers a back stage look at what his job is.  The DVD could be more enjoyable with a few more skits but was satisfying as is.
